ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We rescued the tribe of Israel from the humiliating punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We saved the children of Israel from degrading suffering
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus did We deliver the Children of Israel from the humiliating chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We rescued the Israelites from the humiliating torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We rescued the Descendants of Israel from a disgraceful torture.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We delivered the children of Israel from the abasing chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We delivered the Children of Israel from the humbling chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We delivered the Children of Israel from the shameful doom;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We saved the Children of Israel from their humiliating torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We delivered the Children of Isra'il from an ignominous torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We delivered the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We did deliver aforetime the Children of Israel from humiliating Punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We saved the Children of Israel from a humiliating punishment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We delivered the Children of Israel from the humiliating persecution.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:30] And verily We delivered the Children of Israel from the humiliating chastisement, of having their children slain and their womenfolk taken as servants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We delivered the Children of Israel from the shameful doom) from the painful and severe doom.
